name: Car Price Data
description: Dataset containing technical specifications, fuel characteristics, and performance metrics of cars, along with their market prices.

columns.name: car_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier assigned to each car record in the dataset.

columns.name: gas
columns.description: Indicates whether the car uses gasoline as its fuel type.

columns.name: turbo
columns.description: Indicates whether the car’s engine is turbocharged.

columns.name: four.door
columns.description: Indicates whether the car has four doors.

columns.name: front.engine
columns.description: Indicates whether the car has a front-mounted engine configuration.

columns.name: wheelbase
columns.description: Distance between the centers of the front and rear wheels of the car, measured in inches.

columns.name: carlength
columns.description: Overall length of the car, measured in inches.

columns.name: carwidth
columns.description: Overall width of the car, measured in inches.

columns.name: carheight
columns.description: Overall height of the car, measured in inches.

columns.name: enginesize
columns.description: Total displacement volume of the car’s engine, measured in cubic centimeters (cc).

columns.name: horsepower
columns.description: Maximum power output of the car’s engine, measured in horsepower (hp).

columns.name: peakrpm
columns.description: Engine speed (in revolutions per minute) at which maximum horsepower is achieved.

columns.name: citympg
columns.description: Fuel efficiency of the car in city driving conditions, measured in miles per gallon.

columns.name: highwaympg
columns.description: Fuel efficiency of the car during highway driving, measured in miles per gallon.

columns.name: price
columns.description: Manufacturer’s suggested retail price or market price of the car, expressed in monetary units.
